task_1.description: Label colored cups with the permanent marker to distinguish them by color.
task_1.initial_setup: ~Colored cups are scattered on the white table, and the permanent marker is placed near the cups.~

task_2.description: Use tissue to pick up a paper cup and place it into a designated area.
task_2.initial_setup: ~A paper cup is placed on the white table, and the tissue is folded and positioned nearby.~
